ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Charisma
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know if  mesmerize works the same way as root? Does the critter get a chance to break it every few seconds, or does it have a fixed duration? As
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know if mesmerize works the same way as root? Does the critter
get a chance to break it every few seconds, or does it have a 'fixed'
duration?

As many times as I've cast it, I feel kinda embarrassed asking that.. hehe.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Treadway, Donald [SMTP:dtreadway@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 3:11 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Charisma
>
> I'd thought that. What does it affect? Resists, duration, both? Just
> wanting to get as much info under my belt as possible. =)
>
> > ----------
> > From: Farr, Robert[SMTP:robert.farr@...]
> > Reply To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 4:11 PM
> > To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Charisma
> >
> > An enchanter's greatest spell line is heavily affected by charisma:
> > Mesmerize.
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Treadway, Donald [SMTP:dtreadway@...]
> > > Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 3:08 PM
> > > To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> > > Subject: [eqenchanters] Charisma
> > >
> > > Howdy all, I'm new to the list, and wanted to say hi, and ask a quick
> > > question. Can anyone give me a quick run down on what spells cha
> > affects
> > > for us? I know it seems to lower resist on charm and lull type
> spells,
> > > and
> > > increases duration on charms. Anything else? I'm carrying around cha
> > > equipment for when I wanna charm, but wondering what all it affects so
> I
> > > have a better idea of how to balance it with other stats, mainly int.
> > >
> > > Thanks,
> > > Telonis 23rd level enchanter of E'ci
> > >
> > >
> > >
